entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 7:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Snow over higher terrain early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Local snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then southwest 20 gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
